page.title: 14SPETISBURY SPORTS EVENING
page.content: Spetisbury School P.T.A.held a Games Evening and Barbecue in July 1985. There was plenty to do with all the fun sports,plus the added attractions, such as Skittles, Greasy Pole, a children's Gymnastic display-performed by members of Blandford Gymnastic Club attending the school.We also had a raffle with lovely prizes,including a food hamper for the first prize. The barbecue was also very popular with hot dogs,beefburgers and chicken pieces. The food was very enjoyable and could be complemented with a drink from the bar. At the end of the evening,the first part of the Adventure Playground was officially opened by one of the School Trust Governors.
